description: Practice weapon. Confers no benefit.
name: Training Sword

description: Common soldier's blade. Increases Strength by 3.
name: Sword

description: Double-bitted chopping weapon. Increases Strength by 6.
name: Axe

description: Heavy club with brutal spikes. Increases Strength by 9.
name: Morning Star

description: Sword whose edge bites like the north wind. Increases Strength by 12.
name: Sapphire Blade

description: Weapon whose forge-glow never fades. Increases Strength by 15.
name: Ruby Sword

description: Bane of creatures of darkness. Increases Strength by 18.
name: Golden Sword

description: A rogue's most basic weapon. Confers no benefit.
name: Dagger

description: Light, concealable blade. Increases Strength by 2.
name: Short Sword

description: Slashing sword, swift to deliver a killing blow. Increases Strength by 3.
name: Scimitar

description: Distinctive bush knife, both survival tool and weapon. Increases Strength by 4.
name: Kukri

description: Heavy batons whirled about on a length of chain. Increases Strength by 6.
name: Nunchaku

description: Sleek and deadly as the ninja themselves. Increases Strength by 8.
name: Ninja-to

description: Complex weapon adept at ensnaring and disarming opponents. Increases Strength by 10.
name: Hook Sword

description: For healers in training. Confers no benefit.
name: Novice Rod

description: Crafted during a healer's initiation. Increases Intelligence by 2.
name: Acolyte Rod

description: Topped with a gem bearing curative properties. Increases Intelligence by 3.
name: Quartz Rod

description: Purifies poison at a touch. Increases Intelligence by 5.
name: Amethyst Rod

description: As much a badge of office as a healing tool. Increases Intelligence by 7.
name: Physician Rod

description: Fit to grace the hand of a monarch, or of one who stands at a monarch's right hand. Increases Intelligence by 9.
name: Royal Scepter

description: Soothes the pain of all who look upon it. Increases Intelligence by 11.
name: Golden Scepter

description: Practice staff. Confers no benefit. Two-handed item.
name: Apprentice Staff

description: Basic implement of carven wood. Increases Intelligence by 3 and Perception by 1. Two-handed item.
name: Wooden Staff

description: Focuses power through a precious stone. Increases Intelligence by 6 and Perception by 2. Two-handed item.
name: Jeweled Staff

description: Plated in metal to channel heat, cold, and lightning. Increases Intelligence by 9 and Perception by 3. Two-handed item.
name: Iron Staff

description: As powerful as it is heavy. Increases Intelligence by 12 and Perception by 5. Two-handed item.
name: Brass Staff

description: Assists in weaving the most complex of spells. Increases Intelligence by 15 and Perception by 7. Two-handed item.
name: Archmage Staff

description: Fashioned of orichalcum, the alchemic gold, mighty and rare. Increases Intelligence by 18 and Perception by 10. Two-handed item.
name: Golden Staff

description: No Weapon.
name: No Weapon

description: Feasts upon foes' life essence to power its wicked strokes. Increases Strength by 20.
name: Dark Souls Blade

description: Its glittering facets tell the tale of a hero. Increases all Stats by 6.
name: Crystal Blade

description: Feel the potency of the dragon surge from within! Increases Strength and Perception by 25 each.
name: Stephen Weber's Shaft of the Dragon

description: Meetings, monsters, malaise: managed! Mash! Increases Strength, Intelligence, and Constitution by 17 each.
name: Mustaine's Milestone Mashing Morning Star

description: This champion slew a critical GitHub foe where many warriors fell. Fashioned from the bones of Bug, this hammer deals a mighty critical hit. Increases Strength and Perception by 40 each.
name: Critical Hammer of Bug-Crushing

description: This sword was earned by participating in a sponsored Challenge made by Take This. Congratulations! Increases all Stats by 5.
name: Take This Sword

description: Gives you the ability to command fish, and also deliver some mighty stabs to your tasks. Increases Intelligence by 15.
name: Trident of Crashing Tides

description: Given at the dawn of time to the guardian ghost of the Taskwood Orchards, this lantern can illuminate the deepest darkness and weave powerful spells. Increases Perception and Intelligence by 15 each. Two-handed item.
name: Taskwoods Lantern

description: Strum a merry tune on this magical lute! Increases Intelligence and Perception by 4 each. Two-handed item.
name: Bardic Lute

description: Wax this scythe regularly, or its power will wane. Increases Strength and Perception by 7 each. Two-handed item.
name: Lunar Scythe

description: This rose quartz-tipped spear will imbue you with ancient spell-casting power. Increases Intelligence by 15.
name: Mammoth Rider Spear

description: This sparkly envelope contains messages of encouragement from Habiticans, and a touch of magic to help speed your deliveries! Increases Perception by 15.
name: Roguish Rainbow Message

description: Wave your banner high to inspire confidence! Increases Strength by 16.
name: Page Banner

description: All the best Sneakthieves carry a key that can open any lock! Increases Constitution by 16.
name: Skeleton Key

description: The curved blade of this Scimitar is perfect for attacking Tasks from the back of a mount! Increases Intelligence by 16.
name: Nomad's Scimitar

description: Should anyone dare to impugn your honor, you'll be ready with this fine foil! Increases Strength by 16.
name: Fencing Foil

description: This light and curved sword will shred your tasks to ribbons! Increases Strength by 17.
name: Tachi

description: These bracers and crystals once belonged to the Lost Masterclasser herself. Increases all Stats by 10. Two-handed item.
name: Aether Crystals

description: This spear allows its user to command any yeti. Increases Strength by 15. Limited Edition 2013-2014 Winter Gear.
name: Yeti-Tamer Spear

description: A weapon capable of destroying hordes of enemies! It also helps the user make very nice parallel turns. Increases Strength by 8. Limited Edition 2013-2014 Winter Gear.
name: Ski-sassin Pole

description: A powerful mage's staff. Powerfully DELICIOUS, we mean! Increases Intelligence by 15 and Perception by 7. Limited Edition 2013-2014 Winter Gear. Two-handed item.
name: Candy Cane Staff

description: This wand sparkles with unlimited healing power. Increases Intelligence by 9. Limited Edition 2013-2014 Winter Gear.
name: Snowflake Wand

description: Great for scaling tall buildings, and also for shredding carpets. Increases Strength by 8. Limited Edition 2014 Spring Gear.
name: Hook Claws

description: This mighty sword can slice foes with ease! It also makes a delicious mid-battle snack. Increases Strength by 15. Limited Edition 2014 Spring Gear.
name: Carrot Sword

description: Only the most powerful rodents can brave their hunger to wield this potent staff. Increases Intelligence by 15 and Perception by 7. Limited Edition 2014 Spring Gear. Two-handed item.
name: Swiss Cheese Staff

description: FETCH! Increases Intelligence by 9. Limited Edition 2014 Spring Gear.
name: Lovely Bone

description: Avast! You'll make those Dailies walk the plank! Increases Strength by 8. Limited Edition 2014 Summer Gear.
name: Pirate Cutlass

description: There isn't a task in any To-Do list willing to tangle with this gnarly knife! Increases Strength by 15. Limited Edition 2014 Summer Gear.
name: Seafaring Slicer

description: This trident is used to spear seaweed effectively, for extra-productive kelp harvesting! Increases Intelligence by 15 and Perception by 7. Limited Edition 2014 Summer Gear. Two-handed item.
name: Kelp Catcher

description: This wand, made of aquamarine and live coral, is very attractive to schools of fish. Increases Intelligence by 9. Limited Edition 2014 Summer Gear.
name: Wand of the Shallows

description: Dispatches undead. Also grants a bonus against werewolves, because you can never be too careful. Increases Strength by 8. Limited Edition 2014 Autumn Gear.
name: Silver Stake

description: This grabby claw is at the very cutting edge of technology. Increases Strength by 15. Limited Edition 2014 Autumn Gear.
name: Grabby Claw of Science

description: This enchanted broom flies faster than a dragon! Increases Intelligence by 15 and Perception by 7. Limited Edition 2014 Autumn Gear. Two-handed item.
name: Magic Broom

description: The scarab on this wand protects and heals its wielder. Increases Intelligence by 9. Limited Edition 2014 Autumn Gear.
name: Scarab Wand

description: You truly, definitely, absolutely just picked these up off of the ground. Increases Strength by 8. Limited Edition 2014-2015 Winter Gear.
name: Ice Spike

description: This delicious sword probably attracts monsters... but you're up for the challenge! Increases Strength by 15. Limited Edition 2014-2015 Winter Gear.
name: Gumdrop Sword

description: The light of this crystal staff fills hearts with cheer. Increases Intelligence by 15 and Perception by 7. Limited Edition 2014-2015 Winter Gear. Two-handed item.
name: Winter-lit Staff

description: This scepter warms sore muscles and soothes away stress. Increases Intelligence by 9. Limited Edition 2014-2015 Winter Gear.
name: Soothing Scepter

description: Don't let the sound fool you - these explosives pack a punch. Increases Strength by 8. Limited Edition 2015 Spring Gear.
name: Exploding Squeak

description: It is a real bone club for real fierce doggies and is definitely not a chew toy that the Seasonal Sorceress gave you because who's a good doggy? Whoooo's a good doggy?? It's you!!! You're a good doggy!!! Increases Strength by 15. Limited Edition 2015 Spring Gear.
name: Bone Club

description: Conjure up a carrot for yourself with this fancy wand. Increases Intelligence by 15 and Perception by 7. Limited Edition 2015 Spring Gear. Two-handed item.
name: Magician's Wand

description: When you wave it, it makes a fascinating clickety noise that would keep ANYONE entertained for hours. Increases Intelligence by 9. Limited Edition 2015 Spring Gear.
name: Cat Rattle

description: This relative of fire coral has the ability to propel its venom through the water. Increases Strength by 8. Limited Edition 2015 Summer Gear.
name: Firing Coral

description: The Sun Swordfish is a fearsome weapon, provided that it can be induced to stop wriggling. Increases Strength by 15. Limited Edition 2015 Summer Gear.
name: Sun Swordfish

description: Hidden power glimmers in the jewels of this staff. Increases Intelligence by 15 and Perception by 7. Limited Edition 2015 Summer Gear. Two-handed item.
name: Soothsayer Staff

description: Cures seasickness and sea sickness! Increases Intelligence by 9. Limited Edition 2015 Summer Gear.
name: Wand of the Waves

description: Fearsome To-Dos cower before the flapping of this ax. Increases Strength by 8. Limited Edition 2015 Autumn Gear.
name: Bat-tle Ax

description: Great for elevating things in cornfields and/or smacking tasks. Increases Strength by 15. Limited Edition 2015 Autumn Gear.
name: Wooden Plank

description: A powerful Stitch Witch can control this enchanted thread without even touching it! Increases Intelligence by 15 and Perception by 7. Limited Edition 2015 Autumn Gear. Two-handed item.
name: Enchanted Thread

description: Brewed to perfection! Now you just have to convince yourself to drink it. Increases Intelligence by 9. Limited Edition 2015 Autumn Gear.
name: Swamp-Slime Potion

description: Warming drink, or boiling projectile? You decide... Increases Strength by 8. Limited Edition 2015-2016 Winter Gear.
name: Cocoa Mug

description: Shovel overdue tasks out of the way! Increases Strength by 15. Limited Edition 2015-2016 Winter Gear.
name: Sturdy Shovel

description: Your moves are so sick, they must be magic! Increases Intelligence by 15 and Perception by 7. Limited Edition 2015-2016 Winter Gear. Two-handed item.
name: Sorcerous Snowboard

description: WHEEEEEEEEEE!!!!!!! HAPPY WINTER WONDERLAND!!!!!!!! Increases Intelligence by 9. Limited Edition 2015-2016 Winter Gear.
name: Confetti Cannon

description: You've mastered the ball, the club, and the knife. Now you advance to juggling fire! Awoo! Increases Strength by 8. Limited Edition 2016 Spring Gear.
name: Fire Bolas

description: No one has as many friends as the mouse with tender cheeses. Increases Strength by 15. Limited Edition 2016 Spring Gear.
name: Cheese Mallet

description: Abra-cat-abra! So dazzling, you might mesmerize yourself! Ooh... it jingles... Increases Intelligence by 15 and Perception by 7. Limited Edition 2016 Spring Gear. Two-handed item.
name: Staff of Bells

description: With a wave and a wink, you bring the fields and forests into bloom! Or bop troublesome mice on the head. Increases Intelligence by 9. Limited Edition 2016 Spring Gear.
name: Spring Flower Wand

description: Anyone who battles you is in for a shocking surprise... Increases Strength by 8. Limited Edition 2016 Summer Gear.
name: Electric Rod

description: Bite those tough tasks with this hooked sword! Increases Strength by 15. Limited Edition 2016 Summer Gear.
name: Hooked Sword

description: All the power of the seas filters through this staff. Increases Intelligence by 15 and Perception by 7. Limited Edition 2016 Summer Gear. Two-handed item.
name: Seafoam Staff

description: One spike harms, the other heals. Increases Intelligence by 9. Limited Edition 2016 Summer Gear.
name: Healing Trident

description: Feel the sting of the spider's bite! Increases Strength by 8. Limited Edition 2016 Autumn Gear.
name: Spiderbite Dagger

description: Attack your tasks with these twisting roots! Increases Strength by 15. Limited Edition 2016 Autumn Gear.
name: Attacking Roots

description: Don't ask this orb to tell your future... Increases Intelligence by 15 and Perception by 7. Limited Edition 2016 Autumn Gear. Two-handed item.
name: Ominous Orb

description: One bite harms, and another bite heals. Increases Intelligence by 9. Limited Edition 2016 Autumn Gear.
name: Venomous Serpent

description: This axe is great for attack, defense, and ice-climbing! Increases Strength by 8. Limited Edition 2016-2017 Winter Gear.
name: Ice Axe

description: Conquer your goals by whacking them with this mighty stick! Increases Strength by 15. Limited Edition 2016-2017 Winter Gear.
name: Stick of Might

description: The glowing blue crystal set in the end of this staff is called the Winter Wolf's Eye! It channels magic from snow and ice. Increases Intelligence by 15 and Perception by 7. Limited Edition 2016-2017 Winter Gear. Two-handed item.
name: Winter Wolf Crystal Staff

description: This wand can reach into your dreams and bring you visions of dancing sugarplums. Increases Intelligence by 9. Limited Edition 2016-2017 Winter Gear.
name: Sugar-Spun Wand

description: These blades will make quick work of tasks, but also are handy for slicing vegetables! Yum! Increases Strength by 8. Limited Edition 2017 Spring Gear.
name: Karrotana

description: This mighty whip will tame the unruliest task. But.. It's alsoâ¦ So FUN AND DISTRACTING!! Increases Strength by 15. Limited Edition 2017 Spring Gear.
name: Feathery Whip

description: When you're not crafting spells with it, you can throw it and then bring it back! What fun!! Increases Intelligence by 15 and Perception by 7. Limited Edition 2017 Spring Gear. Two-handed item.
name: Magic Fetching Stick

description: The true magic of this wand is the secret of new life inside the colorful shell. Increases Intelligence by 9. Limited Edition 2017 Spring Gear.
name: Egg Wand

description: The edges of these fins are razor-sharp. Increases Strength by 8. Limited Edition 2017 Summer Gear.
name: Sea Dragon Fins

description: All fear it. Increases Strength by 15. Limited Edition 2017 Summer Gear.
name: The Mightiest Beach Umbrella

description: Summon up magical whips of boiling water to smite your tasks! Increases Intelligence by 15 and Perception by 7. Limited Edition 2017 Summer Gear. Two-handed item.
name: Whirlpool Whips

description: A single touch from this pearl-tipped wand soothes away all wounds. Increases Intelligence by 9. Limited Edition 2017 Summer Gear.
name: Pearl Wand

description: Defeat your foes with sweetness! Increases Strength by 8. Limited Edition 2017 Autumn Gear.
name: Candied Apple Mace

description: All your foes will cower before this tasty-looking lance, regardless of whether they're ghosts, monsters, or red To-Dos. Increases Strength by 15. Limited Edition 2017 Autumn Gear.
name: Candy Corn Lance

description: The eyes of the glowing skull on this staff radiate magic and mystery. Increases Intelligence by 15 and Perception by 7. Limited Edition 2017 Autumn Gear. Two-handed item.
name: Spooky Staff

description: This light dispels fear and lets others know you're here to help. Increases Intelligence by 9. Limited Edition 2017 Autumn Gear.
name: Creepy Candelabra

description: Perfect for climbing walls or distracting your foes with sweet, sweet candy. Increases Strength by 8. Limited Edition 2017-2018 Winter Gear.
name: Peppermint Hook

description: The sparkly appearance of this bright weapon will dazzle your enemies as you swing it! Increases Strength by 15. Limited Edition 2017-2018 Winter Gear.
name: Holiday Bow Hammer

description: Magic--and glitter--is in the air! Increases Intelligence by 15 and Perception by 7. Limited Edition 2017-2018 Winter Gear. Two-handed item.
name: Holiday Confetti

description: This mistletoe ball is sure to enchant and delight passersby! Increases Intelligence by 9. Limited Edition 2017-2018 Winter Gear.
name: Mistletoe Wand

description: What might appear to be cute cattails are actually quite effective weapons in the right wings. Increases Strength by 8. Limited Edition 2018 Spring Gear.
name: Buoyant Bullrush

description: Made of bright gold, this axe is mighty enough to attack the reddest task! Increases Strength by 15. Limited Edition 2018 Spring Gear.
name: Axe of Daybreak

description: This magic flower never wilts! Increases Intelligence by 15 and Perception by 7. Limited Edition 2018 Spring Gear. Two-handed item.
name: Tulip Stave

description: The stones in this staff will focus your power when you cast healing spells! Increases Intelligence by 9. Limited Edition 2018 Spring Gear.
name: Garnet Rod

description: This lightweight, practically unbreakable rod and reel can be dual-wielded to maximize your DPS (Dragonfish Per Summer). Increases Strength by 8. Limited Edition 2018 Summer Gear.
name: Fishing Rod

description: Mighty enough for battle, elegant enough for ceremony, this exquisitely crafted spear shows you will protect your home surf no matter what! Increases Strength by 15. Limited Edition 2018 Summer Gear.
name: Betta Fish Spear

description: Underwater, magic based on fire, ice, or electricity can prove hazardous to the Mage wielding it. Conjuring poisonous spines, however, works brilliantly! Increases Intelligence by 15 and Perception by 7. Limited Edition 2018 Summer Gear. Two-handed item.
name: Lionfish Fin Rays

description: With a benevolent gesture, you command healing water to flow through your dominions in waves. Increases Intelligence by 9. Limited Edition 2018 Summer Gear.
name: Merfolk Monarch Trident

description: When you need to come back to your senses, when you need a little boost to make the right decision, take a deep breath and a sip. It'll be OK! Increases Strength by 8. Limited Edition 2018 Autumn Gear.
name: Vial of Clarity

description: Not quite long enough to unwind behind you for keeping your bearings in a maze. Well, maybe a very small maze. Increases Strength by 15. Limited Edition 2018 Autumn Gear.
name: Whip of Minos

description: This is no ordinary lollipop! The glowing orb of magic sugar atop this staff has the power to make good habits stick to you. Increases Intelligence by 15 and Perception by 7. Limited Edition 2018 Autumn Gear. Two-handed item.
name: Staff of Sweetness

description: Just keep this staff fed, and it will bestow Blessings. If you forget to feed it, keep your fingers out of reach. Increases Intelligence by 9. Limited Edition 2018 Autumn Gear.
name: Starving Staff

description: Use this festive bouquet to further camouflage yourself, or generously gift it to brighten a friend's day! Increases Strength by 8. Limited Edition 2018-2019 Winter Gear.
name: Poinsettia Bouquet

description: This snowflake was grown, ice crystal by ice crystal, into a diamond-hard blade! Increases Strength by 15. Limited Edition 2018-2019 Winter Gear.
name: Snowflake Halberd

description: Watch out! This explosive staff is ready to help you take on all comers. Increases Intelligence by 15 and Perception by 7. Limited Edition 2018-2019 Winter Gear. Two-handed item.
name: Fiery Dragon Staff

description: Winter can be a time of rest and healing, and so this wand of winter magic can help to soothe the most grievous hurts. Increases Intelligence by 9. Limited Edition 2018-2019 Winter Gear.
name: Wand of Winter

description: These weapons contain the power of the sky and rain. We recommend that you not use them while immersed in water. Increases Strength by 8. Limited Edition 2019 Spring Gear.
name: Lightning Bolt

description: Bad habits cower before this verdant blade. Increases Strength by 15. Limited Edition 2019 Spring Gear.
name: Stem Sword

description: There's a mosquito embedded in the stone at the end of this staff! May or may not include Dino DNA. Increases Intelligence by 15 and Perception by 7. Limited Edition 2019 Spring Gear. Two-handed item.
name: Amber Staff

description: Your song of flowers and rain will soothe the spirits of all who hear. Increases Intelligence by 9. Limited Edition 2019 Spring Gear.
name: Spring Song

description: This ancient and formidable weapon will help you win any undersea battle. Increases Strength by 8. Limited Edition 2019 Summer Gear.
name: Antiquated Anchor

description: Now you're fighting with fractals! Increases Strength by 15. Limited Edition 2019 Summer Gear.
name: Red Coral

description: Fruit of your labors, first picked from the pool, this little treasure empowers and inspires. Increases Intelligence by 15. Limited Edition 2019 Summer Gear.
name: Brilliant Bloom

description: The bubbles from this wand capture healing energy and ancient oceanic magic. Increases Intelligence by 9. Limited Edition 2019 Summer Gear.
name: Bubble Wand

description: Whether you're conducting the orchestra or singing an aria, this helpful device keeps your hands free for dramatic gestures! Increases Strength by 8. Limited Edition 2019 Autumn Gear.
name: Music Stand

description: Prepare to rend your foes with the talons of a raven! Increases Strength by 15. Limited Edition 2019 Autumn Gear.
name: Talon Trident

description: Be it forging thunderbolts, raising fortifications, or simply striking terror into the hearts of mortals, this staff lends the power of giants to work wonders. Increases Intelligence by 15 and Perception by 7. Limited Edition 2019 Autumn Gear. Two-handed item.
name: One-Eyed Staff

description: This phylactery can call on the spirits of tasks long slain and use their healing power. Increases Intelligence by 9. Limited Edition 2019 Autumn Gear.
name: Fearsome Phylactery

description: Curved as a gryphon's beak and talons, this ornate polearm reminds you to power through when the task ahead feels daunting. Increases Strength by 20.
name: Mythic Gryphon Glaive

description: Darkness is a Rogue's element. Who better, then, to light the way in the darkest time of year? Increases Strength by 8. Limited Edition 2019-2020 Winter Gear.
name: Lantern Rod

description: Back, squirrels! You will take no piece of this! ...But if you all want to hang out and have cocoa, that's cool. Increases Strength by 15. Limited Edition 2019-2020 Winter Gear.
name: Pointy Conifer Cone

description: With practice, you can project this aural magic at any desired frequency: a meditative hum, a festive chime, or a RED TASK OVERDUE ALARM. Increases Intelligence by 15 and Perception by 7. Limited Edition 2019-2020 Winter Gear. Two-handed item.
name: Rippling Sound Waves

description: Wave it about, and its aroma will summon your friends and helpers to begin cooking and baking! Increases Intelligence by 9. Limited Edition 2019-2020 Winter Gear.
name: Clove Scepter

description: You'll strike so fast it'll look even MORE blue! Increases Strength by 8. Limited Edition 2020 Spring Gear.
name: Lazurite Blade

description: Fight or flight, this wing will serve you well! Increases Strength by 15. Limited Edition 2020 Spring Gear.
name: Sharpened Wing

description: They keep falling on your head! But you'll never stop them by complaining. Increases Intelligence by 15 and Perception by 7. Limited Edition 2020 Spring Gear. Two-handed item.
name: Raindrops

description: An iris is beautiful, but the leaves are like swords... don't be deceived by the flowers, this staff is tough as steel! Increases Intelligence by 9. Limited Edition 2020 Spring Gear.
name: Sword-Lily Staff

description: Stab your enemies or dig in to your favorite foods - this versatile pitchfork does it all! Confers no benefit. November 2014 Subscriber Item.
name: Pitchfork of Feasting

description: For WINGS! For LOVE! For ALSO TRUTH! Confers no benefit. February 2015 Subscriber Item.
name: Shimmery Winged Staff of Love and Also Truth

description: This green and silver lance has unseated many opponents from their mounts. Confers no benefit. May 2015 Subscriber Item.
name: Green Knight Lance

description: All manner of delicious and wholesome foods spill forth from this horn. Enjoy the feast! Confers no benefit. November 2016 Subscriber Item.
name: Copious Cornucopia

description: The fiery glow of this sword will make quick work of even dark red Tasks! Confers no benefit. August 2017 Subscriber Item.
name: Lava Sword

description: This magical stave is as powerful as it is elegant. Confers no benefit. November 2018 Subscriber Item.
name: Splendid Sorcerer's Staff

description: The crystal ball atop this staff can show you the future, but beware! Using such dangerous knowledge can change a person in unexpected ways. Confers no benefit. November 2019 Subscriber Item.
name: Charmed Crystal Staff

description: An accessory that lends you an air of mystery and romance. Sun protection is a bonus! Confers no benefit. February 2020 Subscriber Item.
name: Stylish Sweetheart Parasol

description: Excellent for taking a turn about town. March 3015 Subscriber Item. Confers no benefit.
name: Steampunk Cane

description: This crossbow can pierce a task's armor from very far away! Increases Strength by 5, Perception by 5, and Constitution by 5. Enchanted Armoire: Independent Item.
name: Basic Crossbow

description: The healing power of this wand waxes and wanes. Increases Constitution by 7 and Intelligence by 7. Enchanted Armoire: Soothing Lunar Set (Item 3 of 3).
name: Soothing Lunar Sceptre

description: Lassos: the ideal tool for rounding up and wrangling. Increases Strength by 5, Perception by 5, and Intelligence by 5. Enchanted Armoire: Rancher Set (Item 3 of 3). Two-handed item.
name: Rancher Lasso

description: Though it may seem humble, this sword has made many mythic heroes. Increases Perception and Strength by 6 each. Enchanted Armoire: Golden Toga Set (Item 3 of 3).
name: Mythmaker Sword

description: Fiercely hammered from iron, this iron crook is good at herding sheep. Increases Perception and Strength by 7 each. Enchanted Armoire: Horned Iron Set (Item 3 of 3).
name: Iron Crook

description: The wings on this staff constantly flutter and twist. Increases all Stats by 4 each. Enchanted Armoire: Independent Item.
name: Gold Wing Staff

description: This wand can turn any task into a bat! Wave it about and watch them fly away. Increases Intelligence by 10 and Perception by 2. Enchanted Armoire: Independent Item.
name: Bat Wand

description: Useful for herding gryphons. Increases Constitution by 9. Enchanted Armoire: Shepherd Set (Item 1 of 3).
name: Shepherd's Crook

description: Summon the power of the crescent moon with this shining staff! Increases Intelligence and Strength by 7 each. Enchanted Armoire: Crystal Crescent Set (Item 3 of 3).
name: Crystal Crescent Staff

description: Ready... Aim... Fire! This bow has great range. Increases Perception by 9, Constitution by 8, and Strength by 7. Enchanted Armoire: Iron Archer Set (Item 3 of 3). Two-handed item.
name: Blue Longbow

description: This spear hypnotizes wild tasks so you can attack them. Increases Strength by 15. Enchanted Armoire: Independent Item.
name: Glowing Spear

description: Order! Increases Strength and Constitution by 5 each. Enchanted Armoire: Barrister Set (Item 3 of 3).
name: Barrister Gavel

description: With a wave of your baton and some witty repartee, even the most complicated situations become clear. Increases Intelligence and Perception by 8 each. Enchanted Armoire: Jester Set (Item 3 of 3).
name: Jester Baton

description: Mine the maximum amount of gold from your tasks! Increases Perception by 15. Enchanted Armoire: Miner Set (Item 3 of 3).
name: Mining Pickax

description: A serviceable hand-me-down bow. Increases Strength by 6. Enchanted Armoire: Basic Archer Set (Item 1 of 3). Two-handed item.
name: Basic Longbow

description: A certificate of significant achievement -- well done! Increases Intelligence by 11. Enchanted Armoire: Graduate Set (Item 1 of 3).
name: Habitican Diploma

description: A tool for digging, as well as flicking sand into the eyes of enemy monsters. Increases Strength by 10. Enchanted Armoire: Seaside Set (Item 1 of 3).
name: Sandy Spade

description: Arr! Set your aim with determination. Increases Strength by 15. Enchanted Armoire: Cannoneer Set (Item 1 of 3).
name: Cannon

description: Your arrow will fly like a shooting star from this brilliant red bow! Increases Strength by 15. Enchanted Armoire: Vermilion Archer Set (Item 1 of 3). Two-handed item.
name: Vermilion Archer Bow

description: This club was salvaged from an actual Ogre's lair. Increases Strength by 15. Enchanted Armoire: Ogre Outfit (Item 2 of 3).
name: Ogre Club

description: Made from a fallen limb of an ancient tree, this staff will help you communicate with forest denizens great and small. Increases Intelligence by 12. Enchanted Armoire: Wood Elf Set (Item 3 of 3).
name: Wood Elf Staff

description: This wand sparkles with a warm red light. It will also grant your heart wisdom. Increases Intelligence by 13. Enchanted Armoire: Queen of Hearts Set (Item 3 of 3).
name: Wand of Hearts

description: Use this gnarled staff to work mycological magic! Increases Intelligence by 8 and Perception by 9. Enchanted Armoire: Independent Item.
name: Forest Fungus Staff

description: Enjoy this delightful sparkler responsibly. Increases Perception by 8. Enchanted Armoire: Festival Attire Set (Item 3 of 3).
name: Festival Firecracker

description: Use this lacquered tray to show the fine goods you're offering for sale. Increases Intelligence by 10. Enchanted Armoire: Merchant Set (Item 3 of 3).
name: Merchant's Display Tray

description: This fine iron axe is well-suited to battling your fiercest foes or your most difficult tasks. Increases Intelligence by 6 and Constitution by 8. Enchanted Armoire: Independent Item.
name: Ancient Axe

description: Trim the hooves of your hard-working mounts to help them stay healthy as they carry you to adventure! Increases Strength, Intelligence, and Constitution by 6 each. Enchanted Armoire: Farrier Set (Item 1 of 3).
name: Hoof Clippers

description: Use this comb to pack your weft threads together to make a tightly woven fabric. Increases Perception by 8 and Strength by 9. Enchanted Armoire: Weaver Set (Item 2 of 3).
name: Weaver's Comb

description: This long pole has a wick on one end for lighting lamps, and a hook on the other end for putting them out. Increases Constitution by 8 and Perception by 6. Enchanted Armoire: Lamplighter's Set (Item 1 of 4).
name: Lamplighter

description: Your steeds know what they're doing, so this whip is just for show (and the neat snapping sound!). Increases Intelligence by 8 and Strength by 6. Enchanted Armoire: Coach Driver Set (Item 3 of 3).
name: Coach Driver's Whip

description: This scepter shines with a warm red glow as it grants you increased willpower. Increases Strength by 13. Enchanted Armoire: King of Diamonds Set (Item 3 of 4).
name: Scepter of Diamonds

description: This group of scrappy lepidopterans is ready to flap fiercely and cool down your reddest tasks! Increases Constitution, Intelligence, and Strength by 5 each. Enchanted Armoire: Fluttery Frock Set (Item 3 of 4).
name: Fluttery Army

description: This hammer is specially made for leatherwork. It can do a real number on a red Daily in a pinch, though. Increases Constitution and Strength by 7 each. Enchanted Armoire: Cobbler Set (Item 2 of 3).
name: Cobbler's Hammer

description: Use this tube to blow molten glass into beautiful vases, ornaments, and other fancy things. Increases Strength by 6. Enchanted Armoire: Glassblower Set (Item 1 of 4).
name: Glassblower's Blowpipe

description: Use this to build your resistance to iocane powder and other inconceivably dangerous poisons. Increases Intelligence by 7. Enchanted Armoire: Piratical Princess Set (Item 3 of 4).
name: Poisoned Goblet

description: This bow of gold and gems will send your arrows to their targets at incredible speed. Increases Intelligence by 15. Enchanted Armoire: Jeweled Archer Set (Item 3 of 3). Two-handed item.
name: Jeweled Archer Bow

description: You'd be surprised at how tough books can be. This needle can pierce right to the heart of your chores. Increases Strength by 8. Enchanted Armoire: Bookbinder Set (Item 3 of 4).
name: Needle of Bookbinding

description: This knightly lance is perfect for attacking your reddest Habits and Dailies. Increases Constitution by 13. Enchanted Armoire: Ace of Spades Set (Item 3 of 3).
name: Spear of Spades

description: This ancient To-Do list is filled with strange symbols and spells from a forgotten age. Increases Intelligence by 9. Enchanted Armoire: Scribe Set (Item 3 of 3).
name: Arcane Scroll

description: Raise it as you release your battle cry: âSPOOOON!!â Increases Intelligence by 8. Enchanted Armoire: Chef Set (Item 3 of 4).
name: Chef's Spoon

description: The days are getting longer, but this candle will help you find your way before sunrise. Increases Constitution by 8. Enchanted Armoire: Vernal Vestments Set (Item 3 of 3).
name: Vernal Taper

description: Habiticans are master multi-taskers, so you should have no trouble keeping all these balls in the air! Increases Intelligence by 10. Enchanted Armoire: Independent Item.
name: Juggling Balls

description: Take aim at your red Dailies! Increases Strength by 10. Enchanted Armoire: Independent Item.
name: Slingshot

description: This bow shoots special jade-tipped arrows that will take down even your most stubborn bad habits! Increases Intelligence by 7 and Strength by 6. Enchanted Armoire: Nephrite Archer Set (Item 1 of 3). Two-handed item.
name: Nephrite Bow

description: Perfect for assisting you in a stroll, or for dancing the Charleston. Increases Intelligence, Perception, and Constitution by 6 each. Enchanted Armoire: Boating Set (Item 3 of 3).
name: Bamboo Cane

description: An instrument that will allow you to observe the stars' ancient dance. Increases Perception by 10. Enchanted Armoire: Astronomer Mage Set (Item 3 of 3).
name: Astronomer's Telescope

description: Aha! A piece of evidence! Examine it closely with this fine magnifier. Increases Perception by 7. Enchanted Armoire: Detective Set (Item 3 of 4).
name: Magnifying Glass

description: This lovely silk fan folds when not in use. Increases Constitution by 9. Enchanted Armoire: Independent Item.
name: Florid Fan

description: Demonstrate your swordsmanship with this sharply pointed weapon. Increases Perception by 9. Enchanted Armoire: Independent Item.
name: Resplendent Rapier

description: Creatures of darkness will obey your every command when you wave this glowing mace. Increases Perception by 12. Enchanted Armoire: Shadow Master Set (Item 3 of 4).
name: Shadow Master's Mace

description: Purify metals and other magical compounds with this shiny brass instrument. Increases Strength by 8 and Intelligence by 5. Enchanted Armoire: Alchemist Set (Item 3 of 4).
name: Alchemist's Distiller

description: Is the âHâ for Happy, or Habitica? Your choice! Increases Perception by 7. Enchanted Armoire: Happy Birthday Set (Item 3 of 4).
name: Happy Banner

description: When you're holding this, you're sure to spark someone's interest! Increases Strength by 15. Enchanted Armoire: Match Maker Set (Item 3 of 4).
name: A Lively Match

description: Get a home run on those good habits! Increases Constitution by 9. Enchanted Armoire: Baseball Set (Item 3 of 4).
name: Baseball Bat

description: This may not look fearsome, but have you never had a papercut? Increases Strength by 9. Enchanted Armoire: Paper Knight Set (Item 1 of 3).
name: Paper Cutter

description: You can coax music out of anything with this! ...A violin might work best, though. Increases Strength by 6. Enchanted Armoire: Fiddler Set (Item 3 of 4).
name: Fiddler's Bow
